member.name: T:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.PowerShellExecutor.Controllers.PowerShellExecutorController
member.summary: Execute PowerShell scripts and return the results. Allows AI to execute PowerShell scripts on the local machine. Use this API with caution due to security risks.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.PowerShellExecutor.Controllers.PowerShellExecutorController.ExecuteScript(System.String)
member.param: The PowerShell script to be executed.
member.returns: The output of the executed PowerShell script.
member.exception: Error message explaining why the request failed.
member.remarks: Be cautious with executing scripts received via API due to security risks.

member.name: T:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.PowerShellExecutorHelper
member.summary: Helps AI to execute applications and scripts.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.PowerShellExecutorHelper.StartProcess(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Use to execute a process on user computer. Use `System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo`
member.param: Command-line arguments to use when starting the application.
The working directory for the process to be started. Default is empty string.
member.returns: The output of the started process.
member.exception: Error message explaining why the request failed.
member.remarks: Be cautious with executing process requesys received via API due to security risks.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.PowerShellExecutorHelper.RunPowerShellScript(System.String)
member.summary: Use to execute a PowerShell script on user computer.
member.param: The PowerShell script to be executed.
member.returns: The output of the executed PowerShell script.
member.exception: Error message explaining why the request failed.
member.remarks: Be cautious with executing scripts received via API due to security risks.
